Rule.Name: GRLnoOverlappingActors
Rule.Description: GRL actor boundary must not overlap with the boundary of another actor
Rule.Constraint: self.diagram.contRefs -> forAll( c | (c <> self) implies not(c.isOverlapping(self)) )

Rule.Name: GRLnoOverlappingIEonActor
Rule.Description: GRL intentional element must not overlap with the boundary of an actor

Rule.Name: GRLnoOverlappingIEonIE
Rule.Description: GRL intentional element must not overlap with another intentional element
Rule.Constraint: self.diagram.nodes -> forAll( ie | (ie <> self) implies not(self.ieIsOverlappingIE(ie)) )

Rule.Name: GRLintentionElemInsideButUnbound
Rule.Description: GRL intentional element is visually contained by actor but is not bound to it
Rule.Constraint: self.diagram.contRefs -> forAll(a | (ieIsInside(a) and noIntermediate(a)) implies self.contRef=a)

Rule.Name: TooManyGRLelementsInGraph
Rule.Description: Too many #GRL visual elements in graph...

Rule.Name: UCMnoOverlappingComponents
Rule.Description: UCM component boundary must not overlap with the boundary of another component
Rule.Constraint: self.diagram.contRefs -> forAll( c | (c <> self) implies not(c.isOverlapping(self)) )

Rule.Name: UCMcomponentInsideButUnbound
Rule.Description: UCM component is visually contained by another component but is not bound to it
Rule.Constraint: self.diagram.contRefs -> forAll( c | (c <> self) implies ( (isInside(c) and noIntermediate(c)) implies self.parent=c) )

Rule.Name: UCMpathNodeInsideButUnbound
Rule.Description: UCM path node is visually contained by a component but is not bound to it
Rule.Constraint: self.diagram.contRefs -> forAll( c, ci | (isInside(c) and noIntermediate(c))implies self.contRef=c)

Rule.Name: TooManyUCMelementsInMap
Rule.Description: Too many #UCM visual elements in map...
